name: Potato Casserole
author: Revella Schlosser
instructions: Boil potatoes, cool and grate. Melt butter, add sour cream, cheese, soup and onion. Add to grated potatoes and mix well. Pour into 9 x 13 inch baking dish that has been greased. Top with buttered crumbs if desired. Bake at 325Â° for 45 minutes.
